t: Introducing Amazon Autos: Buy your next car on Amazon in 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon Autos offers online automotive shopping from Hyundai dealers across major metropolitan areas nationwide (see full list below). We continue to add more Hyundai dealerships, and next year, we will roll out additional manufacturers, brands, cities, and new functionality.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Autos FAQs: Amazon Autos
s: Amazon Autos is a partnership between participating local Hyundai dealerships and Amazon that allows you to browse and purchase or lease a car from a dealership through Amazon.com. Vehicles listed at Amazon Autos are sold or leased by participating local dealerships, not by Amazon.
